title: Rosetta Spacecraft Readies For Rendezvous With Comet
teaser: The Rosetta spacecraft hibernated for 31 months while its orbit took it too far away from the sun for its solar arrays to keep it operational. It's ready for a rendezvous with a comet Aug. 6.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
